name: Tomb of the Endless
description:
You are trapped in the Tomb of Unkhdar, and while searching for something lost you will find unwordly artifacts, uncover long forgotten truths and succumb to incomprehensible hidden things. But if you live, may what you find be worth the price.

Inspired by H.P. Lovecraft "The Nameless City" and other books, Tomb of the Endless mixes the gameplay of a retro 2D adventure platformer with a Lovecraftian survival horror story.

Made for "Call of the Jam 2021".

Controls:

Press Arrow Keys to move
Press Spacebar to Jump
Hold Up to turn off Lamp
Hold Down to Crawl
Press Ctrl to Shoot
Press Shift to place Dynamite
